data.name: AutoPayAgreement
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, You have initiated an AutoPay Enrollment of MAF acct # {0}. Your web confirmation # is {1}. For info reply HELP

data.name: AutoPayEnrollment
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, Your AutoPay Recurring Pmt Enrollment is successful for MAF acct # {0} w/ pmt method ending {1}. Confirmation # is {2}. For info reply HELP or to cancel reply AUTOPAY OFF

data.name: CancelSchedule
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, Your scheduled pmt of ${0} for MAF acct # {1} on {2} has been canceled. For info reply HELP

data.name: DeleteAutoPay
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, Your AutoPay Enrollment for MAF acct # {0} has been canceled. For info reply HELP

data.name: DeletePayByText
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, Your Pay By Text on MAF acct # {0} has been canceled. For info reply HELP

data.name: DisableChatByText
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, You have opted out from Chat By Text service from Mid-Atlantic Finance. For info reply HELP

data.name: DisablePaymentConfirmation
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, You have opted out to rcv Payment Confirmation msgs from Mid-Atlantic Finance. For info reply HELP

data.name: DisablePaymentReminder
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, You have opted out to rcv Payment Reminder msgs from Mid-Atlantic Finance. For info reply HELP

data.name: EnableChatByText
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, You have opted in for Chat By Text service from Mid-Atlantic Finance. For info reply HELP

data.name: EnablePaymentConfirmation
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, You have opted in to rcv Payment Confirmation msgs from Mid-Atlantic Finance. For info reply HELP

data.name: EnablePaymentReminder
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, You have opted in to rcv Payment Reminder msgs from Mid-Atlantic Finance. For info reply HELP

data.name: FuturePay
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, You have scheduled future pmt of ${0} for MAF acct # {1} on {2}. Confirmation # is {3}. For info reply HELP

data.name: NotificationsByTextOptOut
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, You have successfully unsubscribed from all Notifications By Text Services and will no longer receive msgs. For info reply HELP

data.name: PayByTextConfirm
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, You've requested to make a pmt of ${0} w/ pmt method ending {1}. To complete approval reply CONFIRM. For info reply HELP or to cancel reply PAYBYTEXT OFF

data.name: PayByTextEnrollment
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, Your Pay By Text enrollment is successful for MAF acct # {0} w/ pmt method ending {1}. Confirmation # is {2}. For info reply HELP or to cancel reply PAYBYTEXT OFF

data.name: PayByTextNotProcess
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, Your pmt of ${0} via Pay By Text cannot be processed. Please call Customer Service @ 800-793-9661 ext 600.

data.name: PayByTextPay
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, MAF Acct #: {0} AmountDue: ${1} Due Date: {2} . Replay PAY or HELP or or to cancel reply PAYBYTEXT OFF

data.name: ScheduledPaymentNotProcess
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, Your scheduled pmt of ${0} cannot be processed. Please call Customer Service @ 800-793-9661 ext 600.

data.name: SuccessfulPayment
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, Payment of ${0} has been received on MAF acct # {1}. Your confirmation # is {2}. For info reply HELP

data.name: SuccessfulScheduledPayment
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, Your scheduled payment of ${0} has been received on MAF account # {1}. Confirmation # is {2}. For info reply HELP

data.name: UnsuccessfulPayment
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, Payment of ${0} was unsuccessful on MAF acct # {1}. {2}For info reply HELP

data.name: UnsuccessfulScheduledPayment
data.value: Dear MAF Customer, Your scheduled payment of ${0} was unsuccessful on MAF account # {1}. Confirmation # is {2}. {reason}For info reply HELP
